Donations

Oneoff Donation

To make a one-off donation please make a cheque out to:

Ethiopian Orphans Support-UK Charity Fund (or EOS-UK Charity Fund)

and post to:

The Hon. Treasurer
EOS-UK Charity Fund
c/o 5 The Cedars
Stockwell Road
Tettenhall
WOLVERHAMPTON
WV6 9AZ
UK

If you have Internet banking, you can also make payments with your debit card. The Charity's account is with Lloyds Bank, A/C No. 59948860 bank sort code 30-94-93.

If appropriate, please downloaded and print the Gift-Aid mandate for one-off donations.

Ad-hoc/one-off Donation Form

Graduation from kindergarten
